727662f-a.folder: Parsons Boulevard & Goethals Avenue, Queens, NY
727662f-a.text:
Parsons Boulevard, east side, between Goethals Avenue and 82nd Drive, showing the Queensboro Hospital. The later view shows also the new buildings of the Queens General Hospital, seen from a hill on the west side of Parsons Boulevard, The hospital grounds, forming the shape of an 'L,' are bound by Parsons Boulevard, Goethals Avenue, 82nd Drive, 164th Street, and Grand Central Parkway. Elizabeth Dreutland owned the property (1891), which consisted of 22.9 acres.
P. L. Sperr  View 1: March 23, 1927
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 2,3: March 25, 1932
